segments.text: Oh my goodness, look at that water overflowing from the sink!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the puddle forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, oh the kids are being so mischievous!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit excited watching them, it reminds me of my own childhood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, looking so cute and innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, but I also hope they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just so full of surprises, I don't know what to expect next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at the chaos unfolding in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
